casebody.data:
State
v.
Mickey Gene Mellon 215P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 15, 2016 C. Scott Holmes, Attorney at Law, for Mellon, Mickey Gene. Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of June 2016."
